(I would just like to point out the US is probably the only true super-power 
left.  No, Britain is not, any country that needs help to beat 
Argentina...well, that's just proof that they ARE NOT super powers.  Thank 
you.

Secondly, trying to remember, my NUMBER ONE problem with Canada is their 
humor.  Anyone in Canada who finds the show "28 Minutes" amusing is deranged, 
idiotic, retarded, brain damaged, comfortably numb (that's a song! :L), and 
needs to be jumed and wheed until it hurts.

Thirdly, when Quebec revolts because they want to be part of France, a very 
strange and unusual idea, who will be helping kick their ass?  Uncle Sam.  

Forthly (my last one, I swear), Canada can pump out all that lumber because 
they are bigger than the US and I believe their population is 170 million 
less than our own, so not a need of reality.  And they also produce hella 
wheat.  Not weed/mary jane/pot, but WHEAT.

Thank you.  Enough with the OOC and BIC crap, take your Canadian bashing 
antics to hell or to private messages.  Thank you, and good night.)

-L. Unitron
Not meant to offend anyone, if you found it offensive it was Zardus that made 
me do it!  If you didn't find it offensive but inspiring, it was all my 
creative brain at work.  If you find mistakes or flaws in what I've typed, 
feel free not to point them out.  

Thank you for your patience.
